title: Metropolitan Museum of Art Agrees to Return $550K in Donations from FTX
description: The Metropolitan Museum of Art, located in New York, has recently announced its decision to return a sum of $550,000 in donations it received from cryptocurrency exchange FTX prior to the exchange’s collapse in November. The museum confirmed its intention to repay the funds to FTX debtors, following negotiations conducted in good faith. This move ... Read more
